name: The Suilumanin
declaringWar: You stand in the way of my people. Let us solve this like warriors!
attacked: You dare have the courage to challenge me, but no fear, for I will sweep you out of history.
defeated: You have the guts to call my body a corpse but beware, I know what will happen to our future.
introduction: If I am cut, Do I not bleed?
tradeRequest: I am not always this generous, but we hope you take this rare opportunity we give you.
